scripts.confgen: npx confgen@latest base bump yarn typescript vite library:VitePluginSql bin prettier
scripts.check:types: tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBUeXBlcyBhcmUgZ29vZCEKCg== | base64 -d; fi
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/*; npm run build:vite; npm run build:types; npm run build:bin
scripts.build:bin: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'|cat - dist/index.umd.js > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out dist/index.umd.js; chmod a+x dist/index.umd.js
